beneficiary.translation[0].definitions[0: someone who gets advantages from an action or change
The rich were the main beneficiaries of the tax cuts.
beneficiary.translation[0].definitions[1: someone who receives money or property from someone else who has died
He was the chief beneficiary of his father’s will.
beneficiary.translation[1].definitions[0: a person who receives money or property from someone who has died
Dorothy’s son was her sole beneficiary.
beneficiary.translation[1].definitions[1: any person or organization that gets an advantage or help from something
Oil companies were the main beneficiaries of the budget.
